The Bike Lights That Think, Not Just Shine

We are Veloneer — a cycling safety revolution born from our love of riding and decades of experience in automotive design. Cycling isn’t just what we do, it’s how we live — and now that we share it with our children, safety has become our top priority.

For us, a bike light should do much more than just shine. Here are some of the intelligent features that make Veloneer truly unique:

AI-Driven Adaptive Lighting
Automatically adjusts beam intensity when braking or accelerating, ensuring optimal visibility and safety.

High Brightness
Front LEDs provide 1,200 lumens in low- and high-beam modes, with a boost to 2,400 lumens for off-road use, offering clear vision on city streets and dark trails.

Epic Battery Life
The front light lasts up to 125 hours and the rear light up to 120 hours in Eco mode. Recharge easily with fast USB-C charging.

StVZO-Compliant Beam
Meets strict German road safety standards with a precise, anti-glare beam and dedicated lights for 360° visibility during nighttime rides.

Versatile Power Options
Integrates with e-bike systems and can draw power from your e-bike's battery, making it perfect for long-distance rides.

Waterproof Durability
Designed to withstand heavy rain and mud, ensuring reliability in all weather conditions.

Ultimate Rider Control
Features a handlebar remote and smartphone app for hands-free operation, allowing you to switch modes and adjust brightness safely and conveniently.

Speed & Cadence Sensor Sync
Syncs with your bike’s sensors to automatically adjust modes based on your pace, optimizing illumination and battery use.

All that in one system - Veloneer AI Smart Bicycle Lights — a connected bundle that includes front and rear smart lights, a speed/cadence sensor, and a remote control. They all work together with AI-powered intelligence, adapting to speed, motion, and riding conditions to deliver rides that are smarter, safer, and greener.

Our goal is straightforward: to bring automotive-grade technology to cycling at an accessible price for every rider, backed by the expertise to achieve it.

How does Veloneer’s AI-driven adaptive lighting actually work?

Veloneer uses built-in sensors to detect your speed, braking, and acceleration. The lights then adjust brightness, beam angle, and intensity in real-time — keeping you visible when it matters most, without you having to lift a finger.
What differentiates Veloneer from other 'smart' bike lights available?

While most lights only increase brightness, Veloneer thinks beyond that. With AI-driven adaptation, speed sensor integration, and rider-first design, Veloneer offers not just visibility but also anticipation — helping you stay safer, ride further, and explore with confidence.
Are the lights legal to use on public roads in Europe and beyond?

Yes. Veloneer front lights are StVZO-compliant, meeting German road-safety standards. That means they’re road-legal across Europe and designed to deliver powerful illumination without dazzling oncoming traffic.
What happens if I ride in heavy rain or extreme weather conditions?

Veloneer is built to thrive outdoors. With robust waterproof protection, the lights
remain fully operational through rain, puddles, and muddy trails — so you can
ride confidently in any weather.
How long do the batteries last, and can I extend runtime on long rides?

The front light runs up to 125 hours, and the rear light up to 100 hours on ECO mode. With the app, you can fine-tune brightness and modes to maximise efficiency. And with fast USB-C charging, you’ll always be ready to roll.
Are all components rechargeable?
Absolutely. Every Veloneer light charges via USB-C for speed and convenience. The headlight even doubles as a powerbank, so you can charge your phone on the go and never miss a beat on long rides.
Can Veloneer lights integrate with my e-bike system?
Absolutely yes. Veloneer was designed to seamlessly connect to e-bike systems. Whether you’re commuting daily or cycling across countries, you’ll never be left in the dark.
Will Veloneer receive software updates?
Yes. Veloneer continues to evolve with you. Through our mobile app, you’ll receive regular software updates and new features — keeping your lights smarter, safer, and always up to date.
Is the app and remote control easy to use while riding?

Yes. The handlebar-mounted remote puts key functions at your fingertips, so you can switch modes or adjust brightness without losing focus. For deeper customisation, the smartphone app lets you fine-tune settings, track performance, and install updates.
How does the wireless remote control my phone?
For safety, the remote features a media control mode. With a quick tap, you can adjust the volume or switch tracks — keeping your hands steady, your focus ahead, and your drive uninterrupted.
Where and how can I purchase Veloneer products?

We are launching soon on Ulule. Backers will receive their Veloneer lights approximately four months after production begins. After the campaign, Veloneer will be available for pre-order and purchase on veloneer.com, as well as on Amazon, eBay, and select retailers worldwide.
